attributes.action: Ban conversion therapy in the whole of the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Conversion therapy has been investigated and has shown a very negative affects on the children that are forced to partake in this cruel and inhumane act. The government legalised same-sex intercourse in 1967 and yet 50 years later, people are allowed to be told that they can be converted.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make it illegal for anyone to access conversion therapy centres in churches and any other places.
